text: The Budișteanca is a left tributary of the river Argeș in Romania. It discharges into the Argeș near Leordeni. It flows through the villages Bujoi, Bârloi, Bogați, Chițești, Schitu Scoicești, Budișteni and Ciulnița. Its length is and its basin size is . ==References== * Trasee turistice – județul Argeș Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Argeș County
title: Budișteanca
